DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate impact increase availability healthy food drink work hour reaction time well-being physician nursing staff . Hospital medical staff often work long hectic hour , without adequate meal rest break order provide 24-hour care . This concern , staff 's well-being important individual welfare , also vital quality safety care patient receive . The investigator believe focus physician nursing staff nutrition investigator see positive effect staff performance well-being - thus ultimately possibly patient safety . Hypothesis : The provision healthy lunch snack meal work hour period 4 week improve reaction time well-being compare habitual diet physician , nurse nurse assistant .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Healthy Lunch Snack Meal Reaction Time Well-being Physicians Nursing Staff ( Go-No-Go )
DOC.detailed_description: The study design randomise control 2 x 4 week cross-over trial , initiate 1-week run-in period . The study sample consist 60 volunteer physician , nurse nurse assistant Herlev University Hospital Copenhagen , Denmark . A healthy lunch snack meal meeting current danish diet recommendation deliver daily work day intervention period . During control period , participant request maintain habitual dietary intake work . Reaction time assess reaction time test Go/No-Go , subtest Test-battery Attention Performance . Changes mood measure Profile Mood State questionnaire . In addition , dietary intake , level physical activity palatability intervention diet register .
DOC.criteria: Employed Herlev University Hospital physician , nurse nursing assistant ( male female ) Age 2070 year BMI 18,530 kg/m2 Work least 30 h/wk Have daily contact patient and/or responsibility may affect patient safety Primarily work day even shift study period Not intention loose weight change lifestyle habit study period Not suffer disease might affect dietary intake ( e.g . food allergy , food intolerance ) Not dine staff canteen , Diastole , week Be able write understand Danish language For work > 35 h/wk holiday/ time duty 9 consecutive day study period . For work < 35 h/wk holiday/time duty 5 consecutive day study period Not able attend plan test study Pregnancy Intensive physical exercise ( e.g . strength training ) > 5 hours/wk Suffer food allergy intolerance
